class_notes: EH department students have priority until November 8, then non-department students can enroll.
course_description: This course presents the fundamental concepts of biomarkers of exposure to environmental chemicals including relevant clinical markers (e.g., inflammation or injury markers). The course introduces students to both quantitative and qualitative biomarker measurements and presents and interpretive framework for using biomarker data.  Students will develop proficiency in applying the principles of exposure science to characterize and quantify environmental exposures.
